snippet.title: Space Sprouts Alpha Gameplay - Indie Cup Europe
snippet.description:
This is a gameplay video giving an impression of the most important mechanics and the atmosphere of our game Space Sprouts.

Space Sprouts is a small time-loop sci-fi sandbox set aboard a Solar Punk spaceship. Explore the place and figure out creative solutions to use weird and whacky items to your advantage. Embrace the chaos of the ship’s interlocking systems, physical gameplay and shifting gravity.
